name: Microman
overview: MicroMan is a platform game. The action takes place on a planet named Galaxia. The player controls a robot who has to collect all the chips needed to overcome rebellious cyborgs. After collecting the chips on the board the robot must reach the teleporter. The planet's defensive system taken over by cyborgs prevents the protagonist from completing the task. The robot can use various bonus items such as gravity switch or magazine with bullets. The game offers a total of thirty-two levels.
